title: Deep mediterranean quiche
summary: An Italian inspired quiche with sun dried tomatoes and courgette. A perfect light meal for a summer's day.
author: Umami
ingredients: For the pastry:,280g plain flour,140g butter,Cold water,For the filling:,1 onion,2 garlic cloves,Half a courgette,450ml soya milk,500g grated parmesan,2 eggs,200g sun dried tomatoes,100g feta
